characters: Multiple pedestrians and cyclists observed. A child in a blue jacket on the right side of the road, a woman with a child crossing from the left side, a man in a yellow jacket running from the left side, and a man on a scooter emerging from the right side.
summary: The video sequence shows multiple instances of 'ghost probing' behavior. In the first sequence, a child suddenly appears from the right side of the road, partially obscured by a parked vehicle. In the second sequence, a woman with a child suddenly crosses from the left side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. In the third sequence, a man in a yellow jacket runs from the left side, emerging from behind a tree. In the fourth sequence, a man on a scooter suddenly appears from the right side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle.
actions: The child on the right side of the road suddenly appears in the driving lane. The woman with a child crosses from the left side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle. The man in a yellow jacket runs from the left side, emerging from behind a tree. The man on a scooter suddenly appears from the right side, emerging from behind a parked vehicle.
key_objects: Parked vehicles on both sides of the road, trees on the left side, a scooter on the right side.
